item.title: By: Gemma
item.dc:creator: Gemma
item.description:
Ugh Heather the thought of that makes me shudder :s but also compelled to go and find them...
We experienced the dual-Athal thing two nights ago. Went to go hand in the quest, and both of us were waiting at different Athal's for the other to come along and hand it in... It took a while before we realised (we were tired). In our defence, on the realm we were on the two were a lot further apart in their loop :p
item.content:encoded:
Ugh Heather the thought of that makes me shudder :s but also compelled to go and find them…

We experienced the dual-Athal thing two nights ago. Went to go hand in the quest, and both of us were waiting at different Athal’s for the other to come along and hand it in…
It took a while before we realised (we were tired). In our defence, on the realm we were on the two were a lot further apart in their loop :p

item.title: By: Heather
item.dc:creator: Heather
item.description: I almost hope they don't fix the aquatic bunnies in the shire. I like the surreality and creepiness of swimming across a stream and finding it full of rabbits.
item.content:encoded: I almost hope they don’t fix the aquatic bunnies in the shire. I like the surreality and creepiness of swimming across a stream and finding it full of rabbits.
